title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Chris is ready to fight
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Chris is ready to fight
description:
After his last fight, the fun DAZN pair of AK and Barak stop by the show to argue with Chris about what to make of Gervonta Davis, where he ranks as a pound-for-pound boxer, and who they think will come out on top between Devin Haney and George Kambosos. Later, Stephen Fulton, the unified super bantamweight world champion joins the show to talk about his upcoming fight with Daniel Roman. Finally, George Kambosos himself drops in to preview his fight with Devin Haney. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
